release_notes:
Remote Support & Stability Update:

- **Remote Support**: Fixed WebSocket connection drops and multi-device support.
- **Auto-Reconnect**: Devices now reconnect automatically with exponential backoff.
- **Dashboard**: Added auto-refresh (10s), device Kill/Unblock controls.
- **Port Range**: Expanded to support up to 1000 simultaneous devices.
- **Crash Fix**: Resolved executor crash when toggling remote access rapidly.
- **Ping/Pong**: Proper keepalive so connections stay alive indefinitely.
